tasks.label: db:down
tasks.command: if [ -z "$GATOR_DB_URL" ] && [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; : "${GATOR_DB_URL:?GATOR_DB_URL is not set}"; goose -dir sql/schema postgres "$GATOR_DB_URL" down

tasks.label: db:up
tasks.command: if [ -z "$GATOR_DB_URL" ] && [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; : "${GATOR_DB_URL:?GATOR_DB_URL is not set}"; goose -dir sql/schema postgres "$GATOR_DB_URL" up

tasks.label: db:login
tasks.command: if [ -z "$GATOR_DB_URL" ] && [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; : "${GATOR_DB_URL:?GATOR_DB_URL is not set}"; psql "$GATOR_DB_URL"

tasks.label: db:status
tasks.command: if [ -z "$GATOR_DB_URL" ] && [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; : "${GATOR_DB_URL:?GATOR_DB_URL is not set}"; goose -dir sql/schema postgres "$GATOR_DB_URL" status
